snippet: Suha Arafat, the widow of the former Palestinian leader Yasir Arafat, petitioned the French authorities on Tuesday to investigate his death in 2004 as a homicide.
abstract: Suhu Arafat, widow of the former Palestinian leader Yasir Arafat, petitions French authorities to investigate his death in 2004 as a homicide; request comes after a Swiss laboratory found that Arafat may have been poisoned with polonium 210, a rare radioactive isotope.
lead_paragraph: Suha Arafat, the widow of the former Palestinian leader Yasir Arafat, petitioned the French authorities on Tuesday to investigate his death in 2004 as a homicide.

headline.main: France: Arafat’s Widow Seeks Homicide Inquiry Into His Death
headline.print_headline: France: Arafat’s Widow Seeks Homicide Inquiry Into His Death
